name: Underwind
description:
Underwind is a 2D platformer made for the GameJam 4 by Backtrace, the theme for the jam is "no violence".

Story

The game takes place in the realm of Nov where humans and monsters co-exist. A woman named Violet is tasked with preventing violence among monsters, hearing that a specific monster wants to become aggressive she enters the underground to search for it to prevent any violence.

Gameplay

The game has basic platformer movement, it includes a dash mechanic, wall sliding and jumping from walls.

Controls

  • AD keys: move left or right.
  • Spacebar: jump.
  • Double tap A or D: dash.

Assets used:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/2d-platfrom-tile-set-cave-61672
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/monsters-creatures-fantasy-1...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/warrior-free-asset-195707
  • https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx
